title: HANGED
description: implementation of the classic Hangman game, developed in React JSX. It includes images that are progressively completed to form the body of the hanged man as mistakes are made.

title: Movies
description: This project is a web application designed to explore and search for movies intuitively. Developed with React, the page displays additional details for each movie accessible through an interactive modal.

title: Gameheaver
description: online entertainment page where you can enjoy your favorite games, compete with friends and improve your skills while having fun.
